Gatekeeper Ziggurat:
To protect this sacred area of the "Crusaders of Light", is undead and demons , which have been specially designed by shamans of ancient magic, these shamans worship "Goddes of Death". They call themselves as: watchman, watcher, sentinel, monk, overlord, priest, archon, inquisitor, guardian, wiseman, royal guard and preacher .
Remember, you should not touch nephilims, lilims, giants, and lithes . This is the power of the ancient gods and holy warriors. Even do not try to touch them with his sword.
